item.title: Development process of this website
item.description: How i got the idea to create a static website This website was created during my semester break. originally I had an unused Raspberry Pi 3 that i wanted to use as a webserver for hosting a website using the Wordpress Content-Management-System. Long story in brief - I installed LAMP (Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP) on the pi and found that the performance of the website was not exactly what I had in mind.

item.title: First Post
item.description: The first post in my new blog. It is for testing some basic functions. Text Quote: "Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.” -Winston S. Privacy Policy We are very delighted that you have shown interest in our enterprise. Data protection is of a particularly high priority for the management of the Patrick Klingenberg. The use of the Internet pages of the Patrick Klingenberg is possible without any indication of personal data; however, if a data subject wants to use special enterprise services via our website, processing of personal data could become necessary. If the processing of personal data is necessary and there is no statutory basis for such processing, we generally obtain consent from the data subject.

item.title: ## About
item.description: The purpose of this website is to provide me with a medium in which I can publish my thoughts and work on topics that interest me. On the one hand, this has the purpose of allowing me to recapitulate topics for myself and, in addition, to make them available to other interested parties. The name T0XICITY is derived from the song Toxicity by the fantastic band System of a Down ♪♫
